hero.slogan: I build data and ML projects with a practical approach.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm an AI and Data Science student passionate about transforming data into practical solutions. My approach spans from exploratory data analysis and cleaning to developing production-ready Machine Learning models. I enjoy documenting processes, measuring real model impact, and continuously learning about new technologies. Currently specializing in Python, SQL, ML frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch) and MLOps workflows in Azure.

project1.bullet3: OpenAI API integration for intelligent analysis

project3.title: Transfer Learning in Azure ML
project3.bullet3: Model comparison and optimization in Azure ML
